title: ATen headers are not copied in lib/include/ATen/*.h
body_html:
Would changing setup.py so that

--- a/setup.py
+++ b/setup.py
@@ -490,6 +490,8 @@ setup(name="torch", version=version,
           'lib/torch_shm_manager',
           'lib/*.h',
           'lib/include/TH/*.h', 'lib/include/TH/generic/*.h',
-          'lib/include/THC/*.h', 'lib/include/THC/generic/*.h']},
+          'lib/include/THC/*.h', 'lib/include/THC/generic/*.h',
+          'lib/include/ATen/*.h',
+          ]},
       install_requires=['pyyaml', 'numpy'],
       )

Solve the issue?

body:
Would changing setup.py so that

```
--- a/setup.py
+++ b/setup.py
@@ -490,6 +490,8 @@ setup(name="torch", version=version,
           'lib/torch_shm_manager',
           'lib/*.h',
           'lib/include/TH/*.h', 'lib/include/TH/generic/*.h',
-          'lib/include/THC/*.h', 'lib/include/THC/generic/*.h']},
+          'lib/include/THC/*.h', 'lib/include/THC/generic/*.h',
+          'lib/include/ATen/*.h',
+          ]},
       install_requires=['pyyaml', 'numpy'],
       )
```

Solve the issue?
